column1: Though the city does not have much this kind of old hindu structure but it is symbolic of its culture of preserving these religious symbols.

Rajeshwar Mahadev Temple is about 850 years old. It is said that the Shivalinga which is situated here is to be established in Rajkheda.this tample event mela in hindu calender savan month first Monday in every year spertual and worship palace in samshabad road agra
